text:
Estefanía Natalia Soto Torres (born 27 April 1993 in Puerto Rico) is a Puerto Rican model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Universe Puerto Rico 2020.
Personal life.
Soto was born on 1993 in Puerto Rico. She has a master's degree in intercultural mediation from the University of Leuven in Belgium. For the past 2 years she has worked for a European organization in Brussels and for the French Embassy in Washington DC. A multilingual, Estefania is fluent in English, Spanish as well as French.
Pageantry.
Soto began her pageantry career representing San Sebastián in the Miss Universe Puerto Rico 2019 on June 13, 2019. She placed as the 1st runner-up and lost to eventual winner Madison Anderson. On September 24, 2020, Soto was appointed as Miss Universe Puerto Rico 2020. She will represent Puerto Rico at Miss Universe 2020.
